nodes.bodyText: The synchronization here needs to encompass the entire time that the locale is altered.  Otherwise a second thread entering this section will pick the current locale as the new altered locale, the first thread retires and restores the correct locale and the second sets it to it's view of the default locale, which is the wrong one.
thought there was a getLanguage() that we could use instead of this string manipulation.
You can initialize your hash set with a Collection using Arrays.asList().
